title: Halcyon’s Tips & Tricks #23 “Decompression Potential”
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
Decompression ain’t no joke.

Returning the default world is HARD. So here is a super helpful tip:
Focus on how you can best be the person you have the potential to be.
NOT on how the world isn’t living up to it’s potential.
